invalidate.heading: Confirm
invalidate.description: You are about to invalidate this code. This action means it cannot be claimed and used by customers anymore.      Do you want to proceed?

success.title: Code Invalidate
success.description: You have successfully Invalidate the promotion code.

error.title: Code is still validated
error.description: Error occured while invidating promotion code.

revalidate.heading: Confirm
revalidate.description: You are about to revalidate this code, which has been invalidated and currently is not usable for redemption by any customer.. This action means it can again be dispatched to a customer and is ready for usage again.      Do you want to proceed?

success.title: Code revalidated
success.description: You have successfully revalidated the promotion code.

error.title: Code is still invalid
error.description: Error occured while relavidating promotion code.
